mapper.sql: id, loopName, loopKey, loopType, loopCurrent, state, remark, status, createDate, updateDate
mapper.insert: insert into loop_ctrl_area (id, loopName, loopKey, loopType, loopCurrent, state, remark, status, createDate, updateDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loopKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loopType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loopCurrent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update loop_ctrl_area set loopName = #{loopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loopKey = #{loopKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loopType = #{loopType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loopCurrent = #{loopCurrent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
